ðŸ“° News we're reading
â€¢ Challenges Linger for Sustainable Packaging Initiatives (thepacker.com) â€” Kevin Kelly, CEO of Emerald Packaging in Union City discusses the challenges and opportunities in sustainable packaging. Despite economic and regulatory hurdles, the company is committed to integrating recycled materials and supporting realistic sustainability goals.
â€¢ 350 V8! 1975 Chevrolet Monza Towne Coupe (barnfinds.com) â€” A 1975 Chevrolet Monza Towne Coupe, a classic car from Union City is up for sale. This refurbished vehicle features a claimed-original V8 engine with several upgrades, offering a nostalgic cruise-ready experience.
â€¢ National Signing Day: Alabama signs 20 (abc3340.com) â€” Alabama's football team has signed 20 new prospects, including Tyrell Miller from Union City. The recruits come from various states, enhancing the team's roster with top talent from across the country.
